content:
Hi everyone,
I'm working on an issue #21941 which makes it possible to enable multiple video call providers.

After going over the proposed solution of replacing the "Video call provider" drop-down with a set of checkboxes, I have a suggestion. Instead of using checkboxes, maybe we can use a multiselect drop-down menu. This way, users can easily select multiple providers from a single menu.

I would love to hear your thoughts on this suggestion and any other feedback you may have regarding this issue.

21914-R.mov
Sure, that seems reasonable to me, thanks! Are you reusing the checkbox design from elsewhere in the settings UI?

We don't currently have a multi-select component, though we will add one for other reasons. I'm not sure such a component would actually feel nicer for picking a set of items from a set of what is currently expected to be <=5 items.
Okay, thanks for the feedback. Based on what you said, I think it makes sense to go with the checkbox design. I'll incorporate that into my PR.
